The chunk is situated within a section explaining the `frameSize` keyword and its role in DirectGui objects. It introduces the concept of optional `frameSize` computation based on text, geom, or image, and lists common keywords for all DirectGui objects.

The frameSize keyword is optional. If you omit it, the default frameSize is computed based on the bounding box of the text, geom, and/or image that you have specified.
